WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The branch radical and the branch kanji are the same! This kanji also means support. To remember it, think about a tree with lots of branches. The branches support each other and the trunk of the tree. If you were to climb the tree, the branches would be able to support your weight too!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture a branch supporting the weight of you, your entire family, and maybe a few friends.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You're happily sitting on this branch, letting it support all this weight, when a sheep (ã—) starts to climb the tree. A very, very big sheep. Uh oh... no no, sheep. If you get on this branch it won't be able to support all this weight!!!
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
The big sheep walks up the side of the tree with its weird hooves and starts to put its weight on the branch. "No no no!" you and your whole family scream. The branch can't support the weight of the sheep. It snaps! You all tumble to the ground.
The end.

humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The seal script is like holding a half-bamboo. The original meaning is to remove the branches of bamboo, and later written as " branch ", see " branch ". "Shuowen": "Go to the branches of bamboo. From holding a half bamboo." "The Book of Songs" uses its original meaning, such as "PoetryÂ·WeifengÂ·Qianlan": "Branch of Qilan".

" Branch " of the original meaning is " sticks after" used, " branch " is mainly used his righteousness, such as branches, meaning the tribe. The pre-Qin classic "Book of RitesÂ·Xia Lixia" reads: "If the branch is not sacrificed, the sacrifice will be reported to the zongzi." Kong Yingdashu: "Zhizi, bastard."

" Zhi " can also be used to disperse, such as "XunziÂ·Fu Guo": "The Hou Di Zhi Liao", Yang Jie's note: "The branch Liao, the branch and the branch are lingering, and the police are wronged."

" Support " is also often used to support and maintain justice. For example, the pre-Qin classic "MandarinÂ·Vietnamese": "The monarchs and ministers all know that their resources are not long enough to support them." "Warring States PolicyÂ·Chu Ce I": "The local five thousand li, the belt one million, the car thousand rides, Riding ten thousand horses, millet for ten years." This meaning is also used in scripts and silk texts, such as "Mawangdui. "Warring States Strategist Book" 212: "A husband is strong together, and the swallows are more powerful than those who can support them. Today, if the three are together to meet the swallows, the fault (disaster) will be great.

" Support " is also used for supply and payment. For example, "Han ShuÂ·Zhao Chongguo Biography": "Foot supports ten thousand people one year old. "Song History Â· Bingzhi Eight": "There are special branches for cold food, Dragon Boat Festival, and Winter Solstice every year, and special branches vary in size."

When " zhi " is used as a noun, it is the abbreviation of the earthly branch, and it is also often referred to as " limb ", as in the script "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips." Legal Questions and Answers 208: "Support or unbroken."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The seal script is like holding a half bamboo, the original meaning is to remove the branches of bamboo.

Elaboration: The seal script is like holding a half-bamboo. The original meaning is to remove the branches of bamboo, and later written as " branch", see " branch". "Shuowen": "Go to the branches of bamboo. From holding a half bamboo." "The Book of Songs" uses its original meaning, such as "PoetryÂ·WeifengÂ·Qianlan": "Branch of Qilan". " Branch" of the original meaning is " sticks after" used, " branch" is mainly used his righteousness, such as branches, meaning the tribe. The pre-Qin classic "Book of RitesÂ·Xia Lixia" reads: "If the branch is not sacrificed, the sacrifice will be reported to the zongzi." Kong Yingdashu: "Zhizi, bastard." " Zhi" can also be used to disperse, such as "XunziÂ·Fu Guo": "The Hou Di Zhi Liao", Yang Jie's note: "The branch Liao, the branch and the branch are lingering, and the police are wronged." " Support" is also often used to support and maintain justice. For example, the pre-Qin classic "MandarinÂ·Vietnamese": "The monarchs and ministers all know that their resources are not long enough to support them." "Warring States PolicyÂ·Chu Ce I": "The local five thousand li, the belt one million, the car thousand rides, Riding ten thousand horses, millet for ten years." This meaning is also used in scripts and silk texts, such as "Mawangdui. "Warring States Strategist Book" 212: "A husband is strong together, and the swallows are more powerful than those who can support them. Today, if the three are together to meet the swallows, the fault (disaster) will be great. " Support" is also used for supply and payment. For example, "Han ShuÂ·Zhao Chongguo Biography": "Foot supports ten thousand people one year old. "Song History Â· Bingzhi Eight": "There are special branches for cold food, Dragon Boat Festival, and Winter Solstice every year, and special branches vary in size." When " zhi" is used as a noun, it is the abbreviation of the earthly branch, and it is also often referred to as " limb", as in the script "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips." Legal Questions and Answers 208: "Support or unbroken."

Radicals: æ”¯  (branch)
Meaning Mnemonic
The branch radical and the branch kanji are the same! This kanji also means support. To remember it, think about a tree with lots of branches. The branches support each other and the trunk of the tree. If you were to climb the tree, the branches would be able to support your weight too!
Picture a branch supporting the weight of you, your entire family, and maybe a few friends.
Reading Mnemonic
You're happily sitting on this branch, letting it support all this weight, when a sheep (ã—) starts to climb the tree. A very, very big sheep. Uh oh... no no, sheep. If you get on this branch it won't be able to support all this weight!!!
The big sheep walks up the side of the tree with its weird hooves and starts to put its weight on the branch. "No no no!" you and your whole family scream. The branch can't support the weight of the sheep. It snaps! You all tumble to the ground.
The end.
